A small collection of test fonts (OpenType and Multiple Master) for testing implementations of font formats. Please see subfolders for more info and licenses.

SmpCurMM

Type 1 Multiple Master test font

A tiny Type 1 Multiple Master font (.pfb + .mmm) with two axes (Weight and Width), containing a few currency symbols: ` $¤¥₠₪₯`. Can be used for test purposes.

The font is located in the type1mm folder, the src folder contains some sources.

The SmpCurMM font is published under the Apache License, Version 2.0. It is based on the Tinos font (Digitized data copyright (c) 2010-2012 Google Corporation).

— Adam Twardoch, February 11, 2016
